client.communication

Class Poller

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.communication.Poller

  • public class Poller
extends java.lang.Object
    The Poller class periodically checks the proxy for a more recent model, updating the given model if it is behind.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Poller.PollingTask
      A wrapper for the TimerTask class

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameManager game
      The Game Manager that is used for updating the model and calling the proxy's checkServerVersion method.
      private int interval
      The time (in seconds) between invoking the timer's TimerTask run method
      private java.util.Timer timer
      The internal timer for the poller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Poller(GameManager game, int interval)
      Creates a new Poller object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Poller

        public Poller(GameManager game,
      int interval)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new Poller object.
        Parameters:
        game - The GameManager that will be used to access the proxy and update the model
        interval - The periodic interval (in seconds) that the poller will poll the proxy.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if GameManager is null, or interval is invalid (i.e. <= 0)

        Parameters:
        interval - The new interval (in seconds) which to poll at.

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws this error if interval is an invalid value (i.e. <= 0)
